param.name: poisson_r
param.label: Poisson radius
param.help: Poisson sphere radius to use for random generation. No two starting muon positions will be closer than this distance. Smaller values make for bigger structure sets.

param.name: struct_name
param.label: Name
param.help: Name of the structure. This name will be postfixed with a unique number, e.g. struct_001 for each generated structure.

param.name: charged
param.label: Charged muon
param.help: If true, the muon will be considered charged instead of a muonium with an accompanying electron. Must be true for UEP calculations.

param.name: geom_steps
param.label: Geometry optimization steps
param.help: Maximum number of geometry optimisation steps.

param.name: vdw_scale
param.label: Van der Waals scale
param.help: Van der Waals scaling factor to use when generating muon sites to avoid existing atoms. Smaller values will allow muons to get closer to the other ions.

param.name: out_folder
param.label: Output folder name
param.help: name to call the output folder used to store the files that the script generates.

param.name: geom_force_tol
param.label: Geometry optimization tolerance
param.help: Tolerance on geometry optimisation in units of eV/Ã….

param.label: Optimization calculator
param.name: calculator
param.help: Calculator to generate structure files for. Must be a single word or a comma seperated list of values. Currently supported calculators are CASTEP, DFTB+ and UEP. Can also select 'all' to generate files for all calculators.

param.name: uep_gw_factor
param.label: Gaussian witdh factor
param.help: Gaussian width factor for UEP calculation. Higher values will make the potential of atomic nuclei closer to the point-like approximation but may introduce artifacts.

param.name: uep_chden
param.label: Path to .den_fmt and CASTEP files
param.help: Name of the .den_fmt file containing the electronic density for an Unperturbed Electrostatic Potential optimisation. The corresponding .castep file must be with the same seedname. Only required for use outside Muon Galaxy

param.name: castep_command
param.label: CASTEP command
param.help: Command to use to run CASTEP.

param.name: castep_param
param.label: PARAM path
param.help: File path to the CASTEP parameter file.

param.name: mu_symbol
param.label: Muon symbol
param.help: The symbol to use for the muon when writing out the CASTEP custom species.

param.name: dftb_set
param.label: DFTB parameter set
param.help: The parameter set to use for DFTB+. Currently supported are: 3ob-3-1 and pbc-0-3. see help section at the bottom of the page for details.

param.name: dftb_optionals
param.label: DFTB optional files
param.help: Additional optional json files to activate for DFTBArgs (for example, dftd3.json will use DFTD3 dispersion forces for 3ob-3-1 if DFTB+ has been compiled to support them).

param.name: dftb_pbc
param.label: Use periodic boundary conditions
param.help: Whether to turn on periodic boundary conditions in DFTB+.

param.name: uep_gw_factor
param.label: UEP: Gaussian witdh factor
param.help: Gaussian width factor for UEP calculation. Higher values will make the potential of atomic nuclei closer to the point-like approximation but may introduce artifacts.

param.name: uep_chden
param.label: UEP: Path to .den_fmt and .castep files
param.help: Path to the .den_fmt file containing the electronic density for an Unperturbed Electrostatic Potential optimisation. The corresponding .CASTEP file must be in the same folder and with the same seedname. Only required for use outside Muon Galaxy

param.name: castep_command
param.label: CASTEP: CASTEP command
param.help: Command to use to run CASTEP.

param.name: castep_param
param.label: CASTEP: PARAM path
param.help: File path to the CASTEP parameter file.

param.name: mu_symbol
param.label: CASTEP: Muon symbol
param.help: The symbol to use for the muon when writing out the CASTEP custom species.

param.name: dftb_set
param.label: DFTB+: DFTB set
param.help: The parameter set to use for DFTB+. Currently supported are: 3ob-3-1 and pbc-0-3. see

param.name: dftb_optionals
param.label: DFTB+: DFTB optionals
param.help: Additional optional json files to activate for DFTBArgs (for example, dftd3.json will use DFTD3 dispersion forces for 3ob-3-1 if DFTB+ has been compiled to support them).

param.name: dftb_pbc
param.label: DFTB+: Use periodic boundary conditions
param.help: Whether to turn on periodic boundary conditions in DFTB+.

param.name: supercell
param.label: Supercell
param.help: Supercell size and shape to use. This can either be a single int, a list of three integers or a 3x3 matrix of integers. For a single number a diagonal matrix will be generated with the integer repeated on the diagonals. For a list of three numbers a diagonal matrix will be generated where the diagonal elements are set to the list. A matrix will be used directly as is. Default is a 3x3 identity matrix.

param.name: k_points_grid
param.label: K-points grid
param.help: List of three integer k-points. Default is [1,1,1].

param.name: max_scc_steps
param.label: Max SCC steps
param.help: If applicable, max number of SCC steps to perform before giving up. Default is 200 which is also the default for DFTB+.
